title: A Look At American Conspiracy Theories
teaser: Conspiracy theories – like 9/11, JFK’s assassination and the moon landing – are driven by our own predispositions, according to Joy Cardin’s guest author . He discusses the causes of conspiracy theories and why people believe them, who benefits from these schemes, and how to determine whether a theory is true or false.
